Class Message

java.lang.Object
User
MsgGroup
Message
public class Message extends MsgGroup
Contains all Message related operations given a groupID.
Author:
Giorgos Tsakalos, Manolis Gialouris, Ilias Mpourdakos, Stefanos Kouroupakis
